Documentation.long_help: This filter will translate the origin of vtkImageData to any specified Corner of the data set assuming it is currently in the South West Bottom Corner (will not work if Corner was moved prior).
Documentation.short_help: This filter will translate the origin of vtkImageData to any specified Corner of the data set assuming it is currently in the South West Bottom Corner (will not work if Corner was moved prior).

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: Corner
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the new origin corner you'd like the origin to reside.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values:
from PVGPpy.filt import translateGridOrigin pdi = self.GetInput() # vtkImageData pdo = self.GetOutput() # vtkImageData
translateGridOrigin(pdi, corner=Corner, pdo=pdo)
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.
